= Update Commands =
WARNING: The errors on your screen need to be read and acted upon, following these directions blindly will result in failure, then ridicule, then more failure.


To eliminate most of the question in IRC (#pentoo) and to start a good documentation process, here are the steps to bring your system up to date


== For the first time ==

{{{
# Sync with the portage tree
emerge --sync && layman -S

# Temporary workarounds
echo 'ACCEPT_LICENSE="Oracle-BCLA-JavaSE AdobeFlash-10.3"' >> /etc/make.conf
layman -d pentoo && layman -a pentoo 
emerge -1 portage 

# Update /etc/portage/profile/packages.{keywords|use|mask}
emerge -1 pentoo-etc-portage && etc-update --automode -5 

# Temporary workarounds
emerge -C talloc && emerge -1 talloc
emerge -f dev-java/sun-jdk dev-java/sun-jre-bin 
emerge -1 sys-apps/sysvinit sys-apps/util-linux
emerge -C net-analyzer/metasploit net-analyzer/fasttrack

# Update everything for the first time
emerge --deep --update --newuse world -vat

# Check live packages for updates and emerge them as necessary.
smart-live-rebuild

# Check and rebuild broken packages after upgrade
revdep-rebuild

# Install the following tool to sync/search ebuilds faster
emerge app-portage/eix
echo "*" > /etc/eix-sync.conf
}}}

== On regular basis ==

{{{
eix-sync
etc-update
emerge -DNu world
smart-live-rebuild
etc-update
emerge --depclean
revdep-rebuild
eclean-dist -d
}}}

Any questions about eix refer to http://en.gentoo-wiki.com/wiki/Eix
